name: Peliq
overview:
Peliq (Peliq.com) highlights the greatest pop culture movies, high-brow and low-brow, indie and mainstream.

Aside from picking pop culture movie classics that appeal to Gen X and Y’ers, Peliq also discusses hot topics about Hollywood in the 20th and 21st century.

How’s Peliq different from Roger Ebert or Rotten Tomatoes? Peliq upholds odd and retro movies that might be too low-brow or indie for popular reviewers to tout.

Also with the emergence of instant streaming as the primary mode of movie viewing, Peliq wants to highlight the best streaming flicks for true movie aficionados.
